title: NBA Finals Preview
description:
Brian Windhorst, Ramona Shelburne and Marc Spears dive into everything you need to know heading into the NBA Finals showdown between the Bucks & Suns, kicking off tonight at 9p ET on ABC.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
